html:
Investment and Banking

You will be introduced to the operations of retail and investment banking in a modern economy. You will explore the principles of investing and the various financial instruments available for investment purposes by individuals and institutions, including shares and fixed income.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand in depth the local financial system\ which includes banking and other financial institutions. [Knowledge and Understanding]

+  Critically evaluate the role of financial institutions and their importance to economic development. [Analysis]

+  Apply knowledge and understanding of key financial instruments and markets to solve complex problems. [Problem Solving]

Module Content:
